name: AttachPlayerObjectToVehicle
notes: You need to create the object before attempting to attach it to a vehicle.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3e and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Attach a player object to a vehicle.
params_title: (playerid, objectid, vehicleid, Float:fOffsetX, Float:fOffsetY, Float:fOffsetZ, Float:fRotX, Float:fRotY, Float:RotZ)

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player the object was created for.

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The ID of the object to attach to the vehicle.

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to attach the object to.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetX
params_body.description: The X position offset for attachment.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetY
params_body.description: The Y position offset for attachment.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetZ
params_body.description: The Z position offset for attachment.

params_body.name: Float:RotX
params_body.description: The X rotation offset for attachment.

params_body.name: Float:RotY
params_body.description: The Y rotation offset for attachment.

params_body.name: Float:RotZ
params_body.description: The Z rotation offset for attachment.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
